title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Job-Linked Mathematics Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical concepts and practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can analyze job-related mathematical problems and solve them with 80% accuracy
Participants can develop project plans applying mathematical approaches based on real-world cases
Participants can achieve over 70% of their learning goals through peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
